title: Golden Oreo Cakesters Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Thought Nabisco wasn't crazy enough to make a Golden Cakester? THINK AGAIN! Get the full review in today's Oreo Oration.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody? Welcome to Oreo Oration. I'm Greg Miller, and while you're out living your life surfing in those waves, uh, the fine people at Nabisco were making endless variations to Milk's Favorite Cookie. So every Wednesday and Friday, I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories. If you like that, like the video then subscribe to my YouTube channel today. We're reviewing God help us all Golden Oreo Cakesters. Now I'm sure you know all about Oreo Oration; you saw last week's show on Wednesday, there I reviewed regular Oreo Cakesters and did not enjoy them - they left a very bad taste in my mouth. I gave them a 4/5 on the review scale, of course we go zero to 10, 10 being the best, zero being the worst. I might have overrated them; it's just sticking with me. We'll see if I have to adjust my scoring here at all. Of course, we start with the first look - once again a good first look. I like the packaging; I like the fact you open up and there's just...

we'll see if I have to adjust my scoring here at all of course we start with the first look once again a good first look I like the packaging I like the fact you open up and there's just it's like glowing it's a bunch of golden tickets gold Oreo tickets that's what I want get another one here another Oreo Cakester again I could sell these on the street I bet doesn't say anything about don't sell them individually so bonus for me oh you tear them open now look these aren't all smooshed and disgusting like the regular Oreo Cakesters were this is random sampling oh wow there's not there isn't the frosting all over them that's or all over the sides like there were on the other one let's take a smell I was yelled at by a producer after we filmed the last one that I did not smell them uh they smell good they smell like the shortbread cookie of the regular Golden Oreo uh Now we move to Oreo Oration's uh second test the tastes of course I already can tell you the the texture is better it's not

Good, they smell like the shortbread cookie of the regular Golden Oreo. Uh, now we move on to Oreo Orations' second test: the taste, of course. I already can tell you that the texture is better; it's not as soft and gross as last time was. Definitely a market improvement over the original Oreo Cakester. The Golden Oreo Cakester, I guess this is what it is right there - it's golden cake. It tastes like golden cake when you bite into it, with some cream in the middle, that's a real thing. Whereas this little chocolate cake bastard that was the Oreo Cakester before - granted, there's chocolate cake, I'm not saying there's no chocolate cake - but the taste, the snack well-taste, it didn't work. This is actually working. I'll take another bite; I'll show you. I don't hate them. I'll also spit it all over the place because what the hell? Okay, let's see how these guys pair with milk. Of course, milk and Oreo go together like milk and Oreos. I don't know - here we go, we're going to

them I'll also spit it all over the place cuz what the hell okay let's see how these guys pair with milk of course milk and Oreo go together like milk and Oreos I don't know here we go we're going to dunk it one two three now here's the thing it's good the taste of course the milk ping I don't think it's a dessert I personally eat I've talked about this before not a huge fan of that vanilla creamy sweetness I like I like the offset of the chocolate cookie on normal re's not not over the hell these things are but it's not bad not bad at all um now we're going to go to the twisting thing we all remember how this P this went like last time I'm not expecting much crack it open Twist it yeah oh no I mean these aren't meant to be twisted obviously they're cakesters they are not Twisters I would imagine a twister I mean I guess you can't cake a cookie either let's get down to Brass tacks though what am I going to score these guys four five for the last Oreo Cakester's these light years ahead of

imagine a twister I mean I guess you can't cake a cookie either let's get down to Brass Tacks though what am I going to score these guys four five for the last Oreo Cakester, these are light years ahead of it um but again not necessarily my cup of tea I'm going to go I mean can't twist them good with milk taste is good I'll give them a flat 7 they're good they're they're a good uh substitute if you're in some place that doesn't have Oreos left and right but for some reason there's a wall full of Cakesters buy the Golden Cakesters you you'll enjoy them so that is the way the cookie crumbles for the Golden Oreo Cakesters but what do you think leave your review as a video response below then like the video subscribe to my channel now here's the big question ladies and gentlemen are there other Oreos out there I am missing for review I am sure there are and what I need you to do is go leave those Oreos in the comments below tell me where you can get them then share this video with your friends so I can

for review I am sure there are and what I need you to do is go leave those Oreo Cakesters in the comments below tell me where you can get them then share this video with your friends so I can continue to make them I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of Golden Oreo Cakesters to review but until then keep on dunking
